text: DWHB-DTV (channel 26) is a television station in Baguio City, Philippines, owned and operated by Broadcast Enterprises and Affiliated Media Inc. The station maintains a transmitter facility atop Mt. Sto. Tomas, Tuba, Benguet. ==Digital television== DWHB-TV currently operates on UHF Channel 26 (545.143 MHz) and is multiplexed into the following subchannels: Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Notes 26.1 1080i 16:9 PIE PIE Commercial broadcast 26.3 480i 4:3 KNOWLEDGE CHANNEL Knowledge Channel 26.5 TV SHOP TVShop Philippines 26.6 LIFE TV Life TV 26.7 1080i 16:9 PILIPINAS HD Pilipinas HD/Oras ng Himala 26.31 240p 4:3 PIE OneSeg PIE 1Seg test broadcast ==Areas of coverage == === Primary areas === * Baguio * Benguet ==== Secondary areas ==== * Dagupan * Pangasinan * La Union * Portion of Nueva Ecija * Portion of Tarlac * Portion of Pampanga * Portion of Bulacan * Portion of Ilocos Sur Category:Filipino television stations
title: DWHB-DTV
